TopicTitle: How can I add more kerman??

Articles.Content:
I want to add more kerman. like 100

How can i do that?

Kerbals? The non-cheaty way to do it is hire them at the astronaut complex or take rescue contracts when playing career mode. The other method is use the Alt-f12 menu for PC. There is a way on console but I don't know to get to it. Select kerbals then create, customize their traits and name, select create kerbal. Unfortunately, if you want 100 you must do this one at a time.
This question about how to play the game has been moved to Gameplay Questions.

8 hours ago, Amir said:

I want to add more kerman. like 100

How can i do that?

Hit Alt-F12, then click on "Kerbals" and then "Create".

Welcome to the forums.

You can also be semi-cheaty about it. You go into the Debug Menu and give yourself a huge amount of funds. Then go to the Astronaut Complex and hire all the kerbals that are there. Leave the building, go back in, and there will be a whole new batch of kerbals to hire. Keep that up and you will have as many kerbals as you want. (You may have to upgrade the Astronaut Complex, of course.)
